languages.text: {n}Разгневанные провидцы пытаются возразить, но Шайрэнкхей мягко прерывает их.{/n} "О большем братья и сестры не смели бы тебя просить, Ирлиэт. Я понимаю твой выбор... Пускай моя душа и не может принять его полностью".

{n}The angry Farseers try to object, but Shairenkhei gently interrupts them:{/n} "Your brothers and sisters would not dare ask you for more, Yrliet. I understand your choice... even if my spirit cannot fully accept it."
languages.original_text: {n}Разгневанные провидцы пытаются возразить, но Шайрэнкхей мягко прерывает их.{/n} "О большем братья и сестры не смели бы тебя просить, Ирлиэт. Я понимаю твой выбор... Пускай моя душа и не может принять его полностью".

traits.locale_text: {n}The angry seers try to object, but Shairenkhei gently interrupts them.{/n} "Brothers and sisters would not dare ask you for more, Yrliet. I understand your choice... Even though my spirit cannot fully accept it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The angry seers try to object, but Shairenkhei gently interrupts them.{/n} "Brothers and sisters would not dare ask you for more, Yrliet. I understand your choice... Even though my spirit cannot fully accept it."

traits.locale_text: {n}The angry seers try to object, but Shairenkhei gently interrupts them.{/n} "Brothers and sisters would not dare ask you for more, Yrliet. I understand your choice... Even though my spirit cannot fully accept it."

traits.locale_text: {n}The angry Farseers try to object, but Shairenkhei gently interrupts them:{/n} "Your brothers and sisters would not dare ask you for more, Yrliet. I understand your choice... even if my spirit cannot fully accept it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The angry Farseers try to object, but Shairenkhei gently interrupts them:{/n} "Your brothers and sisters would not dare ask you for more, Yrliet. I understand your choice... even if my spirit cannot fully accept it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los iracundos videntes tratan de protestar, pero Shairenkhei les interrumpe con cortesía.{/n} «Tus hermanos y hermanas no se atreverían a pedirte más, Yrliet. Comprendo tu decisión... aun cuando mi espíritu no pueda aceptarla».
languages.original_text: {n}The angry Farseers try to object, but Shairenkhei gently interrupts them:{/n} "Your brothers and sisters would not dare ask you for more, Yrliet. I understand your choice... even if my spirit cannot fully accept it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los iracundos videntes tratan de protestar, pero Shairenkhei les interrumpe con cortesía.{/n} «Como hermanos y hermanas no nos atreveríamos a pedirte más, Yrliet. Comprendo tu decisión... aun cuando mi espíritu no pueda aceptarla».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}愤怒的先知们打算反对，但榭伦凯轻声打断了他们。{/n}“我们不敢对你有更多要求，伊莉耶特。我理解你的选择……尽管我的灵魂还无法完全接受。”
languages.original_text: {n}The angry Farseers try to object, but Shairenkhei gently interrupts them:{/n} "Your brothers and sisters would not dare ask you for more, Yrliet. I understand your choice... even if my spirit cannot fully accept it."

traits.locale_text: {n}愤怒的先知们打算反对，但是榭伦凯轻声打断了他们。{/n}“我们不敢对你有更多要求，伊莉耶特。我理解你的选择……尽管我的灵魂还无法完全接受。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les Grands Prophètes en colère tentent d'objecter, mais Shairenkhei les interrompt sur un ton aimable :{/n} « Nul parmi nos frères et sœurs n'oserait vous en demander plus, Yrliet. Je comprends votre choix... même si mon esprit ne peut pas l'accepter totalement. »
languages.original_text: {n}The angry Farseers try to object, but Shairenkhei gently interrupts them:{/n} "Your brothers and sisters would not dare ask you for more, Yrliet. I understand your choice... even if my spirit cannot fully accept it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les prophètes en colère tentent d'objecter, mais Shairenkhei les interrompt sur un ton aimable.{/n} « Nul parmi nos frères et nos sœurs n'oserait vous en demander plus, Yrliet. Je comprends votre choix... même si mon esprit ne peut pas l'accepter totalement. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}怒った先見司たちは異論を唱えようとするが、シャイレンケイは優しくそれを遮った。{/n}「お前の兄弟や姉妹は、あえてそれ以上を求めないだろう、ユリエット。私は、お前の選択を理解する…たとえ私の心がそれを完全に受け入れることができなくともな」
languages.original_text: {n}The angry Farseers try to object, but Shairenkhei gently interrupts them:{/n} "Your brothers and sisters would not dare ask you for more, Yrliet. I understand your choice... even if my spirit cannot fully accept it."

traits.locale_text: {n}怒った先見司たちは異論を唱えようとするが、シャイレンケイは優しくそれを遮った。{/n}「お前の兄弟や姉妹は、あえてそれ以上を求めないだろう、ユリエット。私は、お前の選択を理解する…たとえ私の心がそれを完全に受け入れることができなくともな」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die zornigen Runenpropheten versuchen zu protestieren, doch Shairenkhei unterbricht sie sanft.{/n} "Eure Brüder und Schwestern würden es nicht wagen, mehr von Euch zu verlangen, Yrliet. Ich verstehe Eure Wahl ... Auch wenn mein Geist sie nicht vollständig akzeptieren kann."
languages.original_text: {n}The angry Farseers try to object, but Shairenkhei gently interrupts them:{/n} "Your brothers and sisters would not dare ask you for more, Yrliet. I understand your choice... even if my spirit cannot fully accept it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die zornigen Seher versuchen zu protestieren, doch Shairenkhei unterbricht sie sanft.{/n} "Brüder und Schwestern würden es nicht wagen, mehr von Euch zu verlangen, Yrliet. Ich verstehe Eure Wahl ... Auch wenn mein Geist sie nicht vollständig akzeptieren kann."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Öfkeli Ötesezenler karşı çıkmaya çalışsa da Shairenkhei, onlara nazikçe müdahale ediyor.{/n} "Kardeşlerin, senden daha fazlasını istemeye cüret edemez Yrliet. Her ne kadar ruhum bunu tamamen kabullenemese de... Seçimini anlıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The angry Farseers try to object, but Shairenkhei gently interrupts them:{/n} "Your brothers and sisters would not dare ask you for more, Yrliet. I understand your choice... even if my spirit cannot fully accept it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Öfkeli Ötesezenler, karşı çıkmaya çalışsalar da Shairenkhei onlara nazikçe müdahale ediyor.{/n} "Kardeşlerin, senden daha fazlasını istemeye cüret bile edemez Yrliet. Her ne kadar ruhum bunu tamamen kabullenemese de... Seçimini anlıyorum."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
